entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:32 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 08:26 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 08:26 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:26 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
